description: Your toddler will build fine motor skills, color matching, direction following, turn taking, and decision making with Bit City Builders! Pick up materials from construction sites, roll the die and move your truck to the matching road, and deliver materials to the right site to collect stars. Ravensburger preschool games grow with your child! Big City Builder includes multiple ways for your child to play on their own and for you to play together. Since 1883, Ravensburger has built a reputation across the globe as a trusted brand for parents and children. Ravensburger’s toys, games, and puzzles encourage discovery of what really matters through play.
